description: This file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller that handles basic endpoints such as welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info for the tictactoebackend application.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs' and redirects to Swagger UI, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health' and returns a simple health status string.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns application information.
